response.original_title: BluScenes Gallery Musee - Impressionism & Post Impressionism
response.overview: What would it feel like to see the world through the eyes of an impressionist painter? BluScenes Gallery Mus√©e uses advanced technology and a digital cinema technique called "camera mapping" to add a new dimension to works by the masters of Impressionism and Post-Impressionism. It's a subtle way to integrate technology with the arts.
response.title: BluScenes Gallery Musee - Impressionism & Post Impressionism
